flawed_nl_solution:
Jeff donated 30/100*300 = <<30/100*300=3000/3>>3000/3 pencils.
He remained with 300-3000/3 = <<300-3000/3=-700>>-700 pencils.
Vicki had twice as many pencils as Jeff, meaning he had 2*300 = <<2*300=600>>600 pencils.
When Vicki donated 3/4 of his pencils, he gave away 3/4*600= <<3/4*600=450>>450 pencils.
Vicki remained with 600-450=<<600-450=150>>150 pencils.
Together, Jeff and Vicki remained with 150+-700 = <<150+-700=-550>>-550 pencils.
#### -550

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 90, not 3000/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
